A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed this movie. It was nice to see some different ideas in the universe\, rather than just two hours of nostalgia\, to keep the “I remember that” crowd at bay. I could’ve gone without all of the jokes\, and cheap laughs\, but that’s what sells now\, so I get it. It’s also nice that Rian Johnson didn’t give in to all the fan theories\, and made his own movie. Go see it with an open mind\, and you’ll enjoy it.
